Package io.github.tundeadetunji

Class CheckedDifference

java.lang.Object
io.github.tundeadetunji.CheckedDifference
public final class CheckedDifference extends Object
This class is used to check similarity and contrast between two strings.

Example: String a = "abc"; String b = "ade"; CheckedDifference checked = CheckedDifference.getInstance(a, b); Terminology revolves around "but" and "and", so start typing checked.a will generate (by intellisense) all methods with and likewise checked.b will generate all methods with but This class is no longer maintained, however.
